titlealts.searchtitle: Class: NHS SERVICE AGREEMENT CHANGE - Description

body.p: A change in an NHS SERVICE AGREEMENT applying to a SERVICE .
This may be because of a change of commissioner or a change of an NHS SERVICE AGREEMENT with the same commissioner.

div.p: Two SERVICES PROVIDED UNDER AGREEMENT will be required for each NHS SERVICE AGREEMENT CHANGE
These will end one SERVICE PROVIDED UNDER AGREEMENT Â and start another.
